title: Sans serif fonts
author: saeglopur

comments.content:
RISALRADA BLEND: [Alternate Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131552/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/alternate-gothic-lt) may be...  
125: [Duke](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131552/http:/www.losttype.com/duke) by James T. Edmonson  
GRAM/COFFEE BAR/SPECIALTY ROASTERY/50: [Blair ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131552/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/blair) by Jim Spiece
My God, you're amazing. Thank you!
Bonus: a good base font for 'Stranger' is [Chaman](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131552/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/cubo/chaman).
